title: RHOBH: Peep Show
description:
RHOA gave us Bolo, and this week The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills gave us bolognese. It's the clash we've been waiting all season for (sort of?): Sutton dissing Crystal's leather pants. Meanwhile, Dorit has a new design endeavor, and Erika has survived another day in her $1.5 million cardboard box.

Oooh ooh ooh - this ep is available on Crappens on Demand. Be sure to watch it here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/53454885

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
